sqlMap.statement:
SELECT A.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM , A.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM , A.SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM , A.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM , A.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM , A.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM , A.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD , A.MDSE_NM AS MDSE_NM , A.UPC_CD AS UPC_CD
, A.MDSE_CATG_NM AS MDSE_CATG_NM
FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY W.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,W.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,W.SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,W.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,W.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,W.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,W.MDSE_CD NULLS FIRST ) AS ROW_NUM ,W.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD ,W.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ,W.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD ,W.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM ,W.SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD ,W.SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,W.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD ,W.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,W.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD ,W.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ,W.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD ,W.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ,W.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD ,W.MDSE_NM AS MDSE_NM ,W.UPC_CD AS UPC_CD
,M.MDSE_CATG_NM AS MDSE_CATG_NM
FROM ALL_MDSE_V W
, MDSE_CATG M
WHERE W.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd#
AND W.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND W.GLBL_CMPY_CD = M.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND W.MDSE_CATG_CD = M.MDSE_CATG_CD(+) AND M.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND W.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #zerothProdCtrlCd#
AND W.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #zerothProdCtrlNm#
AND W.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #firstProdCtrlCd#
AND W.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #firstProdCtrlNm#
AND W.SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #scdProdCtrlCd#
AND W.SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #scdProdCtrlNm#
AND W.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #thirdProdCtrlCd#
AND W.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #thirdProdCtrlNm#
AND W.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #frthProdCtrlCd#
AND W.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #frthProdCtrlNm#
AND W.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #fifthProdCtrlCd#
AND W.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #fifthProdCtrlNm#
AND W.MDSE_CD LIKE #mdseCd#
AND W.MDSE_NM LIKE #mdseNm#
AND W.UPC_CD LIKE #upcCd#
AND W.MDSE_CATG_CD = #mdseCatgCd#
) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM <= #rowNum# ORDER BY A.ROW_NUM

SELECT A.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM , A.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM , A.SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM , A.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM , A.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM , A.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD , A.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM FROM ( SELECT W.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD , W.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM , W.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD , W.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM , W.SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD , W.SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM , W.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD , W.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM , W.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD , W.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM , W.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD , W.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM FROM ALL_MDSE_V W WHERE W.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND W.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND ( W.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD IS NOT NULL OR W.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD IS NOT NULL OR W.SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD IS NOT NULL OR W.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD IS NOT NULL OR W.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD IS NOT NULL OR W.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD IS NOT NULL)
AND W.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #zerothProdCtrlCd#
AND W.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #zerothProdCtrlNm#
AND W.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #firstProdCtrlCd#
AND W.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #firstProdCtrlNm#
AND W.SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #scdProdCtrlCd#
AND W.SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #scdProdCtrlNm#
AND W.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #thirdProdCtrlCd#
AND W.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #thirdProdCtrlNm#
AND W.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #frthProdCtrlCd#
AND W.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #frthProdCtrlNm#
AND W.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #fifthProdCtrlCd#
AND W.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #fifthProdCtrlNm#
AND W.MDSE_CD LIKE #mdseCd#
AND W.MDSE_NM LIKE #mdseNm#
AND W.UPC_CD LIKE #upcCd#
AND W.MDSE_CATG_CD = #mdseCatgCd#
UNION SELECT S.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD ,S.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ,S.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD ,S.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM ,S.SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD ,S.SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,S.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD ,S.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM AS THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,S.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD ,S.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ,S.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD AS FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD ,S.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM AS FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM FROM MDSE_STRU S WHERE S.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #globalCmpyCd# AND S.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND S.MDSE_STRU_ELMNT_TP_CD = 'MG'
AND S.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #zerothProdCtrlCd#
AND S.ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #zerothProdCtrlNm#
AND S.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #firstProdCtrlCd#
AND S.FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #firstProdCtrlNm#
AND S.SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #scdProdCtrlCd#
AND S.SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #scdProdCtrlNm#
AND S.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #thirdProdCtrlCd#
AND S.THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #thirdProdCtrlNm#
AND S.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #frthProdCtrlCd#
AND S.FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #frthProdCtrlNm#
AND S.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD LIKE #fifthProdCtrlCd#
AND S.FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM LIKE #fifthProdCtrlNm#
GROUP BY ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD ,ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ,FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD ,FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM ,SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD ,SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD ,THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM ,FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD ,FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ,FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD ,FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM ORDER BY ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,ZEROTH_PROD_CTRL_NM NULLS FIRST ,FIRST_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,FIRST_PROD_CTRL_NM NULLS FIRST ,SCD_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,SCD_PROD_CTRL_NM NULLS FIRST ,THIRD_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,THIRD_PROD_CTRL_NM NULLS FIRST ,FRTH_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,FRTH_PROD_CTRL_NM NULLS FIRST ,FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_CD NULLS FIRST ,FIFTH_PROD_CTRL_NM NULLS FIRST ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #rowNum#
SELECT MSET.MDSE_STRU_ELMNT_TP_CD ,MSET.MDSE_STRU_ELMNT_TP_DESC_TXT MDSE_STRU_ELMNT_TP_NM FROM MDSE_STRU_ELMNT_TP MSET WHERE MSET.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND MSET.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
